articles.description: Signal users can now donate cryptocurrencies to the nonprofit organization that supports the app.
articles.content:
Users of major privacy-oriented messaging app Signal can now support the project with cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC).
Signal officially announced Monday that the platform has started accepting … [+1311 chars]

articles.author: Mitchell Clark
articles.title: Companies can silently reroute your texts to hackers, sometimes for just $16 - The Verge
articles.description: Motherboard has found that SMS redirect services, often aimed toward businesses, can be used by hackers to silently read a victim’s text messages. The carriers seemingly don’t want to take any responsibility.
articles.content:
Its an industry aimed at businesses, but its open to nefarious uses
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Theres a newly discovered attack on SMS messaging thats almost invisible to victims, and … [+3080 chars]
